amendment.description: Amendment moves approximately $412 million in incentive pay for Afghan military to the incentive pay account for American personnel.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for overseas military personnel, including military, reserve, and national guard personnel of the Army, Navy, Marine Corps and Air Force by $148,462,000 and to reduce funding for the Afghanistan Security Forces Fund by $412,287,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jones amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
